page.title: 16Housing in Whitburn
page.content: The types of housing in Whitburn are varied.Here is a description of some streets in Whitburn. Front Street. The oldest housing in Whitburn is around Front Street being between one hundred to two hundred years old.The only recent housing is flats at Whitburn Hall being less than five years old.These were built on the site of an old mansion called Whitburn Hall which was burnt down in 1974.There are large detached houses over 1OO years old and terraced Victorian houses. In the area of Adolphus Street the housing is over 100 years old.It is terraced houses and cottages. In Rackly Way the houses are over 3O years old.They are terraced in groups of 4 with playing fields around them. There is sheltered accomodation in the form of flats at Croftside House.
